How should I prepare the pumpkins and squash for roasting? Adjust oven rack to center position and preheat to 350°F (180°C). Working with one pumpkin at a time, use a sharp paring knife to cut the top of the pumpkin off in one piece. Carefully run knife along the cavity of the pumpkin to loosen seeds and stringy pulp, then use a spoon to scoop them out and scrape the cavity clean.
